meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the bronchi.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used bronchoscopes to look inside the patient's lungs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital purchased new bronchoscopes for the respiratory department.
meanings.sent3: During the examination, the bronchoscopes started telling jokes to the medical team.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a pair of bronchoscopes, exploring every corner of the bronchi.
meanings.sent5: The bronchoscopes illuminated the dark passages of the bronchi like tiny flashlights.
